nodes.text: The Sacred Way was a religious organization active during the rule of the Galactic Empire. Priest Dobarn Tren was a member of the Sacred Way, and had travelled to Coronet City on the planet Corellia aspiring to ease the suffering of the city's population. In 13 BBY, Tren regretfully volunteered to leave rather than be forcibly deported after law enforcement suspected of him operating in the black market.
